content: pipe cleaner if you want to be able to pose the tail> f/o leave a tail for sewing sew onto the body ears floofs make 2 in light purple 1 4ch turn 2 skip first chain single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet f/o leave a tail for sewing sew onto the head in front of the lower halves of the ears ears accents make 2 in dark blue felt cut triangle shapes out of dark blue felt and glue them onto the inner surface of the ears forehead jewel cut a dot out of red felt and glue it on alternatively- tie a knot with red yarn and sew it onto the forehead or glue a red plastic gem onto the forehead eyes glue or sew on black plastic eyes nose etc in black yarn or embroidery thread sew a tiny nose centered between the eyes *optional* mouth sew a w shape immediately below the nose it s also fine to omit both nose and mouth- it s very much a matter of preference pattern by *brinady* this is a free pattern you may share it freely and sell the items you make please do not sell the pattern it is a free pattern
